Welcome to your new home at 804 Jefferson Ave!
You?ll absolutely love your new, fabulous 1-bedroom home, graced with an array of modern fixtures and finishes as well as a thoughtful split-wing layout. Your 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is a stunning Bed-Stuy rental nestled close to restaurants, grocery stores, bars, and parks. Features of the home include hardwood floors, recessed lighting, casement windows, and in-wall heating and cooling units.
The home opens into a cozy living room and kitchenette. The kitchenette is equipped with a sleek white countertop, a mosaic tile backsplash, lacquer cabinetry, and a suite of stainless steel electric appliances from Blomberg, Frigidaire, LG, and Haier, including a dishwasher and a microwave. Your full bathroom has been upgraded with modern features including a beautiful, mosaic tile wall!
804 Jefferson is located just a quick jaunt away from all of the restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and shops that line Ralph and Patchen Avenues and Malcolm X Boulevard. You will be just a few minutes from Broadway and very close to Reinaldo Salgado Playground and Saratoga Park. The building has an elevator, bicycle storage, a fully-equipped laundry room, a common rooftop deck with gorgeous neighborhood views, and on-site parking at an additional fee. The J and Z subway lines are only a few blocks away.
Schedule your private showing with us today!
July 1 move in Broker fee applies Pets OK for $50/mo

Welcome to 119 Albany Ave, a beautifully renovated one-bedroom apartment located in the highly sought-after neighborhood of Crown Heights North. This meticulously updated unit offers modern and stylish finishes, creating a contemporary living space for your comfort and enjoyment.
Step inside to discover a thoughtfully designed interior that showcases a seamless blend of classic and contemporary elements. The apartment boasts updated stainless steel appliances, adding a touch of elegance and functionality to the well-appointed kitchen. The hardwood floors throughout the unit enhance the overall aesthetic appeal and provide a warm ambiance.
The queen-sized bedroom offers a peaceful retreat with ample space for relaxation and rest. The prime location of 119 Albany Ave provides easy access to transportation options, including the nearby subway stations, allowing for a hassle-free commute to other parts of Brooklyn and beyond. Additionally, the neighborhood is dotted with an array of excellent eateries, offering a diverse range of culinary delights to explore.
One of the most enticing aspects of this apartment is that there is no broker fee, ensuring a straightforward rental process. Guarantors are also welcome, providing flexibility for those who may require additional support during the application process. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make 119 Albany Ave your new home. Available starting July 1st, this beautifully renovated one-bedroom apartment offers modern comforts, convenient amenities, and a fantastic location in vibrant Crown Heights North.

details.description:
It sounds like you've found an incredible space in Gowanus! This large 2-bedroom duplex w/ basement with a back deck. Let's dive into the details:
This duplex boasts two levels of spacious living:
Upstairs, you'll find two well-appointed bedrooms, each with its own closet, alongside an open kitchen/living area and a full bathroom. Downstairs, the large basement offers two additional rooms and a convenient half bath, along with the added bonus of a back deck! The apartment is equipped with central A/C and heat, a dishwasher, and shared laundry facilities for added convenience.
Nestled between 3rd and 4th Aves in Gowanus, the location couldn't be more convenient. Just steps from the Union Street R station, with easy access to Atlantic Ave-Barclays (2/3/4/5/B/D/N/Q/R) and Bergen; Carroll St (F/G) stations, commuting is a breeze. Plus, you'll have a wealth of shops, restaurants, and bars right at your doorstep.
This duplex offers the perfect blend of space, comfort, and convenience. Don't miss out?schedule a viewing today!

This apartment sounds like a dream! With brand new appliances and a spacious kitchen featuring a dishwasher and kitchen island, cooking and entertaining would be a breeze. The fact that each bedroom has a queen-sized bed, ensuite bathroom, standard-sized closet, and big window ensures comfort and convenience for everyone living there. Plus, having central AC and laundry in the building are huge bonuses. And with easy access to public transportation and plenty of nearby amenities like bars, cafes, and restaurants, it seems like the perfect blend of comfort and convenience!
